titleStmt.title: Beaufrons, or, A new-discovery of treason under the fair-face and mask of religion, and of liberty and conscience : in an answer to the Protestant reconciler ... / by one of His Majestie's chaplains.
titleStmt.author: Jenner, David, d. 1691.

notesStmt.note: Attributed by Wing to David Jenner.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
